Function reference

Primary functions

These are the functions you’re likely to need for any assessment. For most standard assessments, these will be all you need.

read_data()
Read HARSAT data
tidy_data()
Tidy the data
create_timeseries()
Create a time series
run_assessment()
Assess timeseries for trends and status
update_assessment()
Update timeseries assessments
check_assessment()
Check whether the assessments have converged
write_summary_table()
Write assessment summary to a csv file
plot_assessment()
Graphical summaries of an assessment
report_assessment()
Reports the assessment of individual time series

All functions

add_stations()
Add stations to contaminant data from an ICES extraction
apply_subset()
Apply subsetting to a time series
check_assessment()
Check whether the assessments have converged
check_convergence_lmm()
Checks convergence of an assessment model
convert_reftable()
Add OSPAR_subregion to simplified sediment threshold reference table
convert_units()
Converts units, e.g., from mg/kg to ug/kg
create_timeseries()
Create a time series
cstm.VDS.environment()
Detects the environment from the call
ctsm.VDS.cl()
Calculates confidence limits for imposex time seriesl
ctsm.VDS.index.opt()
ctsm.VDS.index.opt
ctsm.VDS.loglik.calc()
ctsm.VDS.loglik.calc
ctsm.VDS.p.calc()
ctsm.VDS.p.calc
ctsm.VDS.varlist
ctsm.VDS.varlist
ctsm.projection()
Calculates a polar projection
ctsm_TBT_convert()
Convert tin concentrations
ctsm_convert_basis()
Basis and matrix information and basis conversion
ctsm_get_determinands()
Get the determinands to be assessed
ctsm_get_info()
Gets data from the standard reference tables
ctsm_uncrt_plot_data()
Generates a relative uncertainty plot
get_AC
Access function map
get_AC_biota_OSPAR()
Gets OSPAR threshold values for biota
get_basis_biota_OSPAR()
Gets the OSPAR biota target basis
get_basis_default()
The default function for generating a basis
get_station_code()
Get station code from station name
get_timeseries()
Extracts timeSeries
harsat harsat-package
harsat: Harmonized Regional Seas Assessment Tool
info_TEF
TEF values for selected groups of compounds
locate_information_file()
Find the path for an information file
normalise_biota_HELCOM()
Normalises biota concentrations, HELCOM vwersion
normalise_sediment_HELCOM()
Normalises sediment concentrations, HELCOM version
normalise_sediment_OSPAR()
Normalises sediment concentrations, OSPAR vwersion
plot_assessment()
Graphical summaries of an assessment
read_contaminants()
Reads contaminant data
read_data()
Read HARSAT data
read_stations()
Reads station dictionary
report_assessment()
Reports the assessment of individual time series
report_file_digest()
Generates and logs a file digest
run_assessment()
Assess timeseries for trends and status
run_control_default()
Default control parameters for run_assessment
run_control_modify()
Modifies control parameters for run_assessment
safe_read_file()
Reads an input file, given a particular encoding, and possibly additional hints
subset_assessment()
Subsets an assessment object
tidy_data()
Tidy the data
update_assessment()
Update timeseries assessments
write_summary_table()
Write assessment summary to a csv file
